name: Rose
overview: The young private investigator Hiroshi Musō has a troubled past involving amnesia and the death of the man he considered his father. He opened his office to pursue crime, aided by his lovely servant Medi. One day, a school girl calls Musō and tells him her father has disappeared. The detective agrees to take the case and soon discovers a net of crime and corruption in the city. Rose is a Japanese-style detective adventure. Most screens offer the player a menu with a selection of verbs, mostly including looking, talking, sometimes asking or taking, and a special command referring to a sexual act. Navigation is done by selecting locations from a menu as well. It is usually necessary to question every person about every topic, and visit locations multiple times to advance the story. The game has explicit sex scenes, some of which are animated.
